properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: String used as a secret when generating JWT.

properties.name: jwt.tokenValidity
properties.description: Number of milliseconds for how long token will be valid.

properties.name: jwt.authoritiesKey
properties.description: String that will be used as a key when getting token from header..

properties.name: neo4j.username
properties.description: Username which will be used when connecting to Neo4j.

properties.name: neo4j.password
properties.description: Password which will be used when connecting to Neo4j.
